title: G hotel Penang signage
content:
Name of font please?

author: gren

comments.content: Nothing specific here, that could be a lot of font, simply removing top ear. Maybe you'll be luckier with a non-angled sample: [http://www.ghotel.com.my/images/landing/logo.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415030255/http:/www.ghotel.com.my/images/landing/logo.png "http://www.ghotel.com.my/images/landing/logo.png")
